About ERP Academy

Meet Your SAP Expert

With 6+ years of industry experience and 500+ successful student placements, Akshay Kumar brings real-world SAP expertise to every training session.

4.9/5 Rating
500+ Students

Transforming Careers Through Expert SAP Training

I'm Akshay Kumar, a passionate SAP professional with over 6 years of hands-on experience in enterprise resource planning systems. My journey in SAP began with a vision to make complex business processes simple and accessible for everyone.

At ERP Academy, I combine theoretical knowledge with practical industry experience to deliver training that truly prepares students for real-world challenges.

Your Learning Journey

SAP Learning Roadmap

A structured 12-week journey from SAP fundamentals to career-ready professional. Follow our proven roadmap used by 500+ successful students.

500+
Students Trained
95%
Certification Rate
90%
Placement Success
4.9/5
Student Rating
Foundation PhaseWeek 1-2

SAP Fundamentals & ERP Concepts

Master the basics of enterprise resource planning and SAP ecosystem architecture

Key Topics Covered:

  • Introduction to ERP and SAP landscape
  • SAP navigation and basic transactions
  • Understanding business processes
  • SAP terminology and concepts

Learning Outcomes:

ERP fundamentals certifiedSAP navigation masteryBusiness process understanding
Core LearningWeek 3-8

SAP MM Material Management Mastery

Deep dive into SAP Material Management with hands-on practice and real-world scenarios

Key Topics Covered:

  • Master data creation and maintenance
  • Procurement processes and purchase orders
  • Inventory management and stock movements
  • Vendor management and evaluation
  • Invoice verification and payment processing

Learning Outcomes:

MM module expertiseReal project experienceProcess optimization skills
Advanced SkillsWeek 9-10

Advanced SAP Concepts & Integration

Learn complex SAP functionalities and module integrations for enterprise solutions

Key Topics Covered:

  • Cross-module integration (MM-FI-SD)
  • Advanced reporting and analytics
  • Customization and configuration
  • Workflow and approval processes
  • Performance optimization techniques

Learning Outcomes:

Integration expertiseAdvanced reporting skillsOptimization knowledge
Certification PrepWeek 11-12

SAP Certification & Career Readiness

Comprehensive certification preparation and career development guidance

Key Topics Covered:

  • Official SAP certification exam preparation
  • Mock tests and practice scenarios
  • Resume building and LinkedIn optimization
  • Interview preparation and soft skills
  • Job search strategies and networking

Learning Outcomes:

SAP certification readyProfessional portfolioCareer guidance completed
